byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Duration: some German authorities cautious on predicting war end
snippet: BERLIN, Sept. 2--German air raiders in their attack on the British Isles today were declared to be concentrating chiefly on objectives in Southeastern England. They are reported to have bombed many British air bases and set hangars and barracks af...

headline.main: BERLIN SEES KEENER FIGHT; Speculates About 'Decisive Hour' for Britain in Air War

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Sept. 2--German air raiders in their attack on the British Isles today were declared to be concentrating chiefly on objectives in Southeastern England. They are reported to have bombed many British air bases and set hangars and barracks afire.
